column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Verify Document Intelligence service endpoint accessibility and authentication
column4: 1. Initialize Document Intelligence client with endpoint and key 2. Attempt to connect to service 3. Verify authentication success
column5: Service connection established successfully with HTTP 200 response

column3: Test Blob Storage connectivity and container operations for document storage
column4: 1. Connect to storage account using connection string 2. List containers 3. Upload test document 4. Verify file upload success
column5: All storage operations complete successfully and files accessible

column3: Validate Key Vault access and secret retrieval for Document Intelligence credentials
column4: 1. Authenticate using managed identity 2. Retrieve Document Intelligence endpoint secret 3. Retrieve API key secret 4. Verify values
column5: All secrets retrieved successfully with correct values

column3: Test invoice extraction using Document Intelligence pre-built invoice model
column4: 1. Submit sample invoice PDF 2. Process with prebuilt-invoice model 3. Extract key fields 4. Validate extracted data structure
column5: Invoice fields extracted: number date vendor amount line items with 95%+ accuracy

column3: Test receipt extraction using Document Intelligence pre-built receipt model
column4: 1. Submit sample receipt image 2. Process with prebuilt-receipt model 3. Extract transaction data 4. Validate results
column5: Receipt fields extracted: merchant date total items with 93%+ accuracy

column3: Test form extraction using custom trained Document Intelligence model
column4: 1. Submit sample form document 2. Process with custom model 3. Extract field values 4. Validate against expected data
column5: Custom form fields extracted with 90%+ accuracy per training data

column3: Test complete document processing workflow from upload to extraction
column4: 1. Upload document to input container 2. Trigger processing function 3. Monitor status 4. Verify processed container
column5: Document moves through pipeline with extracted data in Cosmos DB

column3: Test automatic routing of low-confidence documents to human review queue
column4: 1. Submit document with poor quality scan 2. Process document 3. Verify confidence score below threshold 4. Check review queue
column5: Low confidence documents routed to review queue with metadata

column3: Test extracted invoice data transmission to ERP system via REST API
column4: 1. Process invoice document 2. Extract vendor and amount data 3. Send to ERP endpoint 4. Verify ERP receipt
column5: Extracted data successfully transmitted to ERP with confirmation

column3: Test extracted document metadata transmission to CRM system
column4: 1. Process document 2. Extract metadata 3. Send to CRM endpoint 4. Verify CRM record creation
column5: Document metadata successfully recorded in CRM system

column3: Test system handling of invalid or corrupted document uploads
column4: 1. Submit invalid file format 2. Submit corrupted PDF 3. Submit empty file 4. Verify error responses
column5: Graceful error handling with descriptive messages and failed container routing

column3: Test processing of documents with multiple pages
column4: 1. Submit 25-page PDF document 2. Process all pages 3. Extract data from each page 4. Consolidate results
column5: All pages processed successfully within timeout with consolidated results

column3: Test processing multiple documents submitted simultaneously
column4: 1. Upload 10 documents to input container 2. Trigger batch processing 3. Monitor all documents 4. Verify completion
column5: All documents processed successfully within 10 minutes

column3: Test document submission via REST API endpoint
column4: 1. Authenticate to API 2. Submit document via POST 3. Get processing status 4. Retrieve results
column5: API accepts document and returns status and results correctly

column3: left
column4: left
column5: left

column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Establish baseline processing time for single documents
column4: 1. Submit invoice PDF 2. Start timer at upload 3. Stop at completion 4. Record time 5. Repeat 20 times
column5: Average processing time under 90 seconds for standard documents

column3: Test system performance under concurrent document processing load
column4: 1. Configure 50 concurrent submissions 2. Submit documents simultaneously 3. Monitor response times 4. Track success rate
column5: 95% success rate with response time under 3 minutes per document

column3: Test sustained high-volume document processing capability
column4: 1. Submit 500 documents over 4 hours 2. Monitor throughput 3. Track system metrics 4. Verify all processed
column5: Throughput of 125+ docs/hour maintained without degradation

column3: Verify Azure Functions auto-scaling behavior under load
column4: 1. Start with baseline load 2. Increase to trigger scale-out 3. Monitor instance count 4. Decrease load 5. Verify scale-in
column5: Scale-out triggers within 2 minutes and scale-in within 10 minutes

column3: Validate API endpoint response times meet SLA requirements
column4: 1. Test document submission endpoint 2. Test status endpoint 3. Test results endpoint 4. Measure latencies
column5: API response times under 500ms for status and under 2s for results

column3: Verify 99.5% uptime SLA over 30-day monitoring period
column4: 1. Configure uptime monitoring 2. Track availability metrics 3. Log all outages 4. Calculate availability
column5: System availability of 99.5% or higher over monitoring period

column3: Validate API authentication and authorization enforcement
column4: 1. Test API access without auth 2. Test with invalid token 3. Test with valid token 4. Verify RBAC
column5: Unauthorized requests rejected with 401/403 and authorized accepted

column3: Verify RBAC implementation for different user roles
column4: 1. Test admin user access 2. Test reviewer user access 3. Test standard user access 4. Verify boundaries
column5: Users access only permitted resources per assigned Azure AD roles

column3: Verify encryption at rest and in transit for all document data
column4: 1. Check Blob Storage encryption 2. Monitor network traffic 3. Verify Key Vault key usage 4. Test access
column5: All data encrypted with customer-managed keys in Key Vault

column3: Test private endpoint connectivity and network access restrictions
column4: 1. Test access from allowed VNet 2. Test from internet 3. Verify NSG rules 4. Test private endpoint
column5: Private endpoints functional and public access blocked per configuration

column3: Validate backup and restore procedures for Cosmos DB and Blob Storage
column4: 1. Create backup 2. Simulate data loss 3. Execute restore 4. Verify data integrity
column5: RTO under 4 hours and RPO under 1 hour with full data recovery

column3: Test regional failover capability for business continuity
column4: 1. Document current state 2. Simulate region failure 3. Execute failover procedure 4. Verify service
column5: Failover completes within RTO with minimal data loss per RPO

column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Business validation of invoice processing workflow accuracy
column4: 1. Upload 50 real invoices 2. Review extracted data 3. Compare to manual entry 4. Calculate accuracy rate
column5: Invoice extraction accuracy of 95%+ with all required fields populated

column3: Business validation of receipt processing for expense management
column4: 1. Process 30 expense receipts 2. Validate merchant and amount 3. Test date extraction 4. Verify categorization
column5: Receipt processing meets 93%+ accuracy with expense integration working

column3: Business validation of custom trained model on organization forms
column4: 1. Process 25 sample forms 2. Validate all custom fields 3. Check checkbox detection 4. Verify signatures
column5: Custom form fields extracted with 90%+ accuracy per business requirements

column3: Test human review interface and correction workflow
column4: 1. Access review queue 2. Review flagged documents 3. Make corrections 4. Submit approved data
column5: Review interface intuitive with corrections saved and processed correctly

column3: Validate document processing status visibility and reporting
column4: 1. Submit documents 2. Monitor status in dashboard 3. View processing metrics 4. Generate reports
column5: Real-time status updates visible with accurate metrics and exportable reports

column3: Business validation of extracted data appearing in ERP system
column4: 1. Process invoice documents 2. Verify data in ERP 3. Check field mapping 4. Validate calculations
column5: Extracted data appears correctly in ERP with proper field mapping

column3: Validate users can perform tasks after training completion
column4: 1. Complete training program 2. Perform document submission 3. Review extraction results 4. Handle exceptions
column5: Users complete tasks independently with 90%+ success rate post-training

column3: Test handling of documents requiring manual intervention
column4: 1. Identify failed documents 2. Access failed container 3. Review error details 4. Reprocess or route
column5: Clear error messages and straightforward reprocessing or escalation path

column3: Test processing mixed document types in single batch
column4: 1. Upload mix of invoices receipts and forms 2. Process all 3. Verify correct model used 4. Check results
column5: Each document type processed with appropriate model and accuracy targets

column3: End-to-end validation of document processing in actual business workflow
column4: 1. Submit documents via normal channels 2. Track through processing 3. Verify downstream updates 4. Confirm completion
column5: Full business workflow functions with document processing integrated
